long_description: Lightweight without being cramped, the Marmot Traillight 2P tent has ample headroom and 2 doors for easy access. Traillight 2P accommodates 2 people and boasts near vertical sidewalls for a spacious interior. Center-zip vestibule provides room for gear; smaller vestibule provides an additional access point and additional stashing space. Mesh canopy walls circulate air and offer exceptional views during warm, clear nights, while fabric panels add privacy. Color-coded poles and clips simplify and speed tent setup. DAC Pressfit(R) poles feature a securely fixed, pressed-in ferrule, ensuring the poles will remain strong and reliable. Catenary-cut floor provides a tight pitch; taped seams are lifted off the ground to ensure waterproof protection. Lightweight, durable polyester rainfly has silicone and polyurethane coatings for waterproof protection and UV resistance. Jingle-free zippers promote undisturbed sleep; inside pockets store and organize small gear. Light-reflective guyout points help you find the Marmot Traillight at night.
short_description: Lightweight without being cramped, the Marmot Traillight 2P tent has ample headroom and 2 doors for easy access.
